title: How To Raise An Alpha You Love
description:
Description :
        
The prominent Kamimaru family treasures all of their talented descendants. But this isnt the case for Nio the only omega in a line of unbroken alphas. When the death of his sister in-law and brother happens it forces Nio to return to the house he left. The son of the deceased reminds Nio of his younger self so he decides to take him in. 
What will happen with these two living together?
